diagram_definition: Represents steps, actions, decisions in a process.
Shows object interactions over time, emphasizing message exchange.
Describes system structure: classes, attributes, operations, relationships
Models object states and transitions between them.
Visualizes data objects, attributes, their relationships.
Maps user steps to achieve a goal with a product/service
Visualizes project tasks, timelines, dependencies, progress
Shows parts of a whole, where slices represent proportions.
Plots data on four quadrants based on two variables.
Illustrates system requirements and their relationships.
Visualizes branching and merging history of a Git repository.
Visualizes software architecture at different abstraction levels.
Visual representation of ideas and their connections.
Represents events or milestones in chronological order.
Text-based syntax to generate sequence diagrams.
Plots data pairs on X-Y axes  to show relationships.
